indications: pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution indicated treatment presbyopia adults .
contraindications: recommended pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution one drop eye daily . one topical ophthalmic product used , products administered least 5 minutes apart .
warningsAndPrecautions: pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution usp , 1.25 % supplied sterile , clear , colorless solution filled low density polyethylene white opaque bottle low density polyethylene white opaque nozzle , dark green colored high density polyethylene cap . available follows : 2.5 ml 5 ml bottle ( filled 1/2 capacity ) : ndc 60219-2366-2 storage store 15° 25°c ( 59° 77°f ) . opening , pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution , usp used expiration date bottle .

name: Pilocarpine Hydrochloride Ophthalmic
indications_original: Pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution is indicated for the treatment of presbyopia in adults.
contraindications_original:
The recommended dosage of pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution is one drop in each eye once daily.
                  If more than one topical ophthalmic product is being used, the products should be administered at least 5 minutes apart.
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
Pilocarpine Hydrochloride Ophthalmic Solution USP, 1.25% is supplied as a sterile, clear, colorless solution filled in low density polyethylene white opaque bottle and low density polyethylene white opaque nozzle with, dark green colored high density polyethylene cap. It is available as follows:
                  2.5 mL in 5 mL Bottle (Filled to 1/2 Capacity):                                            NDC 60219-2366-2
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  Store at 15° to 25°C (59° to 77°F). After opening, pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution, USP can be used until the expiration date on the bottle.
adverseReactions_original: Pilocarpine hydrochloride ophthalmic solution is contraindicated in patients with known hypersensitivity to the active ingredient or to any of the excipients.
